events.message: I received the new blender I ordered, but it has a large scratch on the lid and does not seem to be working properly.
The issue has been classified under product defect due to the damage and malfunction reported by the customer.
A customer support agent has been assigned to assist with the defective product report.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your blender. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please send us photos of the scratch and describe the problems you are experiencing with the blender’s operation?
I have attached pictures showing the scratch, and the blender stops working after a few seconds every time I try to use it.
Thank you for the information. We will arrange a replacement for your blender and provide a prepaid shipping label for returning the defective unit.
That sounds great, thank you. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the replacement.
Your replacement blender has been shipped and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you have any further issues.
We are checking in to ensure that you received the replacement blender and that it works as expected.
I received the new blender today and it works perfectly. Thanks again for your help resolving this so quickly.
We’re glad to hear that your issue is resolved! Closing the case now, and don’t hesitate to reach out if you need anything else.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback on the support you received.
